meta_description.title: Secret of Mana - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Secret of Mana, originally released in Japan as Seiken Densetsu 2, is a 1993 action role-playing game developed and published by Square (now Square Enix) ...Genre(s): Action role-playingDirector(s): Koichi IshiiArtist(s): Shinichi Kameoka; Hiroo Isono‎Publisher(s): Square‎Gameplay · ‎Plot · ‎Development · ‎Reception and legacy

meta_description.title: Secret of Mana on Steam
meta_description.text: Originally released in 1993, "Secret of Mana" is by far the most popular title in the “Mana” series. Now it's finally getting a long-awaited, full 3D remake!Publisher: Square EnixProcessor: INTEL Core i3 2.4GHzGraphics: GeForce GT730 / RADEON R7 240OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit)US$39.99
